column14: ValueSet: Birth Sex (Codes describing the sex assigned at birth as documented on the birth registration.)
column16: This CodeSystem should but be used for the BirthSex ValueSet.  BirthSex (i.e. Clinical Sex )should be XX|XY|other (e.g. XXY, XYY) rather than gender (male/female)
column17: AdministrativeGender CodeSystem should but be used for the BirthSex ValueSet.
